Package com.veeva.vault.vapil.api.request

package com.veeva.vault.vapil.api.request
Methods to perform Vault API calls, with each method mapping to a Vault API endpoint

For example, ObjectRecordRequest.retrieveObjectRecord(recordId) maps to https://developer.veevavault.com/api/25.1/#retrieve-object-record
